and multiplies it by the base point to obtain the value R<sub>a</sub>:

~~~~

parameters required to calculate i. Bob then calculates his
value R<sub>A</sub> and multiplies it by the base point to obtain 
the value R<sub>b</sub>:

~~~~

    r_b:            357703172778544611151024590171513348987587331362
        5047348937830611338356015225

and thus the value k.

~~~~

    k:              191464273158714866609057932739443292408921734175
        9841034395901206846913974559

~~~~

    S_b:            505679567127610534980904072949853830811108042524
        9437908768113836573113097145

        7109316960282272126637535229
